title: Sound of TOKIMEKI
description: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club Original Soundtrack Sound of TOKIMEKI (TVアニメ『ラブライブ！虹ヶ咲学園スクールアイドル同好会』オリジナルサウンドトラック Sound of TOKIMEKI) is an album containing BGM tracks and insert songs from the Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club anime series.

infobox.Artist: Naoki Endo & Nijigasaki High School Idol Club
infobox.Label: Lantis
